name: ms-teams-vscode-extension
description: Create, debug, and deploy Teams apps with Teams Toolkit
author: Microsoft Corporation

teamsfx-add-feature.description: Add feature icon in command tree view

teamsfx-developer-portal.description: Developer portal icon in command tree view

teamsfx-m365.description: Microsoft 365 icon in command tree view

teamsfx-add-environment.description: Microsoft 365 icon in command tree view

editor/title.when: resourceFilename == manifest.local.template.json || resourceFilename == manifest.remote.template.json || resourceFilename == manifest.template.json && !fx-extension.isV3Enabled

background.endsPattern: ^.*(Worker process started and initialized|Host lock lease acquired by instance ID).*$

problemMatchers.name: teamsfx-func-hosted-bot-watch
problemMatchers.label: TeamsFx Azure Functions Hosted Bot Problems

background.endsPattern: ^.*(Worker process started and initialized|Host lock lease acquired by instance ID).*$
Local tunnel service is started successfully

scripts.compile: tsc -p ./ && npm run copy-files && npm run copy-md-files
scripts.build: rimraf out && webpack --mode development --config ./webpack.config.js && npm run compile
scripts.pretest: npm run lint && npm run check-format && npm run test-compile
scripts.test:unit: rimraf out && rimraf coverage && npm run compile && nyc mocha --config .mocharc.json
